name: hand_id
description: Unique identifier for the hand

name: tournament_id
description: Tournament identifier

name: hand_number
description: Hand number within the tournament

name: timestamp
description: When the hand was played (ISO 8601 format)

name: duration_seconds
description: Hand duration in seconds

name: description
description: English description of the hand action (used for search)

name: hero_name
description: Name of the hero (main player in focus)

name: villain_name
description: Name of the villain (opponent)

name: hero_position
description: Hero's position at the table (BTN, SB, BB, UTG, MP, CO)

name: villain_position
description: Villain's position at the table

name: hero_stack_bb
description: Hero's stack size in big blinds

name: villain_stack_bb
description: Villain's stack size in big blinds

name: street
description: Street where the key action occurred (PREFLOP, FLOP, TURN, RIVER)

name: pot_bb
description: Final pot size in big blinds

name: action_sequence
description: Sequence of actions in the hand

name: hero_action
description: Hero's key action in the hand (fold, call, raise, all-in, check)

name: result
description: Hand result from hero's perspective (WIN, LOSE, SPLIT)

name: tags
description: Searchable tags for categorization

name: hand_type
description: Primary hand classification (BLUFF, VALUE_BET, HERO_CALL, etc.)

name: video_url
description: GCS URL to the video file (gs://bucket/path)

name: video_start_time
description: Hand start time in video (seconds)

name: video_end_time
description: Hand end time in video (seconds)

name: thumbnail_url
description: Optional thumbnail image URL

name: ati_version
description: ATI system version that generated this metadata

name: ati_confidence
description: ATI analysis confidence score (0-1)

name: created_date
description: Partition key - date when the hand was indexed (YYYY-MM-DD)

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the hand was indexed

name: gcs_source_path
description: Original GCS path of the source JSON file
